thread.title: Marleau scores twice as Sharks top Ducks in home opener
thread.title_full: Marleau scores twice as Sharks top Ducks in home opener - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ross McKeon
title: Marleau scores twice as Sharks top Ducks in home opener
text: Patrick Marleau supplied the offense and goalie Martin Jones backstopped an excellent defensive effort as the Sharks opened their home schedule with a 2-0 win over the Anaheim Ducks on Saturday night.
